title: Content Management System
description: A CMS project from scratch, building the database, coding in PHP, and designing the front-end using CSS, resulting in a fully functional content management system.

title: Movie Search Website
description: A React.js movie search website, developing a dynamic movie search application using an API, reusable components, and custom CSS.

title: Formula 1 Drivers Search App
description: A React.js Formula 1 drivers search app, working in a group assignment to build a search application using an API.

title: Parks and Open Spaces Search Application
description: A search web application for parks and open spaces using a public API from the city of Winnipeg, creating a search application using JavaScript.
